Viktoria Krykunova's 'double punishment': Refugee from eastern Ukraine faces enemy collaboration charges
description: While living in her Russian-occupied hometown of Svatove, the young woman worked for a pension office responsible for distributing payments to residents, funded by Moscow. Ukrainian prosecutors have requested a seven-year prison sentence.

headline: The young professionals taking their parents' experiences to heart and changing how they work
description: Between exhaustion, loss of meaning and admiration, the younger generation is shaping its relationship with work after witnessing their parents' professional struggles and the profound transformation of the workplace.

headline: France's first Slow Fashion Week champions a simple, recycled approach to fashion
description: Designers and vintage enthusiasts gathered in Marseille from June 7 to June 14, far from the glitz of major fashion capitals, to promote an alternative fashion model where secondhand clothing takes center stage.

headline: How the US split Europe to invade Iraq at any cost in 2003
description: 'Transatlantic divorce' (1/5). In the aftermath of September 11, American neoconservatives made plans to attack Iraq, despite opposition from France and Germany. From then on, to achieve its aims, the White House relied on its allies in Eastern Europe, dividing the European family for years to come.

description: Convinced that political liberalism was deeply rooted in the US, American historians long downplayed the far right's influence within the conservative movement. In light of new historiography, Trump appears less a historical accident and more the result of a long gestation.

headline: On the Canadian side of lake Ontario, a new identity emerges in the shadow of Trump
description: Straddling the border between Canada and the US, Lake Ontario has long served as a model for the harmonious management of a shared space. But Donald Trump's declarations undermine that balance.

headline: The collapse of the 'axis of resistance'
description: Faced with Israel, the Islamic Republic of Iran can no longer count on its allies in Lebanon, Iraq and Yemen, which have been weakened since Hamas's attack on Israel, on October 7, 2023.
